hero.title: Preserving Aceh's Stories, Building Resilience
hero.subtitle: An AI-powered archive of personal experiences from the tsunami and peace process, transformed into educational resources for future generations.

about.subtitle: A three-layer architecture that transforms personal stories into powerful educational tools
about.step1_desc: Citizens share experiences via WhatsApp in Acehnese, Indonesian or English. Youth ambassadors help record stories from elders.
about.step2_desc: Natural language processing analyzes, translates, and maps stories to educational modules while preserving cultural context.
about.step3_desc: Stories become interactive comics, audio dramas, simulations and physical EduBoards in community spaces across Aceh.
about.why_desc: "Suara Samudra" isn't just about disaster SOPs. It's about preserving collective memory, strengthening sense of belonging, and building context-relevant resilience and peace communication in post-tsunami, post-conflict Aceh.
about.benefit1: Combats misinformation through curated, fact-checked local narratives
about.benefit2: Integrates local wisdom (Smong, gotong royong) with modern disaster science
about.benefit3: Supports healing through guided reflection and community dialogue

contribute.title: Share Your Story
contribute.subtitle: Your experience matters. Help build Aceh's collective memory and resilience.
contribute.step1_desc: Use our WhatsApp Assistant to share your story in text, voice note, or short video.
contribute.step2_desc: Our bot will help structure your story and ask clarifying questions if needed.
contribute.step3_desc: Get personalized educational content based on your experience.
contribute.prompt1: "Where were you when the tsunami hit?"
contribute.prompt2: "How did your community recover in the months after?"
contribute.prompt3: "What lessons about peace did Aceh learn from the disaster?"
contribute.prompt4: "How has Smong (local wisdom) helped your family prepare?"
contribute.consent: I agree to the terms and consent to my story being used for educational purposes
